KEEP CHECKING EVERY WEEK FOR NEW UPDATES!!!
The Genocide & Human Rights University Program is a two-week course at the beginning of August which takes a comparative approach to the study of genocide using a number of case studies such as the Armenian Genocide, the Jewish Holocaust, the Cambodian Genocide, the Rwandan Genocide and Darfur. It will allow you to express yourself more effectively on issues of genocide and human rights and at the same time, you will meet like-minded youth from all over the world and make new connections!
www.genocidestudies.org www.zoryaninstitute.org
ALSO, if you are interested in the GHRUP and would like to participate: Search for Genocide and Human Rights University Program as a Facebook Group and JOIN NOW!
1. Genocide is a universal human experience and that, as such, it must be the concern of all individuals and institutions.
cause.mission: The mission of the IIGHRS is to help develop a new generation of scholars to engage in research and publication in the field of genocide and human rights studies.
cause.name: International Institute for Genocide & Human Rights Studies
